title: Council Decision of 21 March 2011 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Freedom of Movement for Workers for Italy and Hungary
header:
24.3.2011 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 92/6
COUNCIL DECISION
of 21 March 2011
appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Freedom of Movement for Workers for Italy and Hungary
2011/C 92/03
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 of 15 October 1968 on freedom of movement for workers within the Community (1), and in particular Articles 26 and 27 thereof,
Having regard to the lists of candidates submitted to the Council by the Governments of the Member States,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 21 October 2010 (2), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Freedom of Movement for Workers for the period from 25 September 2010 to 24 September 2012, with the exception of certain members.
(2) The Governments of Italy and Hungary have submitted nominations for a number of posts to be filled,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Freedom of Movement for Workers for Italy and Hungary, for the period ending on 24 September 2012:
I.   GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES
Country Members Alternates
Italy Ms Grazia STRANO Mr Daniele LUNETTA
Hungary Ms Eszter ENYEDI Ms Hajnalka ERDŐS
II.   TRADE UNION REPRESENTATIVES
Country Members Alternates
Italy Ms Ornella CILONA Ms Ilaria FONTANIN
Hungary Ms Judit IVÁNYI dr. CZUGLERNÉ Mr László KOZÁK
III.   EMPLOYERS' ASSOCIATIONS REPRESENTATIVES
Country Members Alternates
Italy Mr Armando OCCHIPINTI Ms Paola ASTORRI
Hungary Ms Terézia BOROSNÉ BARTHA Ms Adrienn BÁLINT
The members not yet nominated will be appointed by the Council at a later date.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 March 2011.
For the Council
The President
MARTONYI J.
(1)  OJ L 257, 19.10.1968, p. 2.
(2)  OJ C 294, 29.10.2010, p. 1.
